t: A Day To Remember - Homesick - Amazon.com Music
s: I’m pretty sure it was brand new because it still had the plastic and was sealed. Overall great album, plays amazing and in great shape. ... New listener here, absolutely love it. Got the vinyl version, plays great, seems to be pressed well unlike some others I've heard from other artists. I'm a sucker for album cover art, and I am not disappointed, very dark and colorful. The record comes with a code to download the album in MP3 format...

s: You’re going to want this on vinyl. Great record. ... Many memorable, fun tracks off this album! All I want, 2nd sucks, sticks and bricks, It's complicated, to name a few of them! ... I was expecting the cd case, but instead arrived the digipack! So happy for that! ... R. Bingaman · Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2010 ... If someone can find 2 A Day To Remember ...

t: A Day To Remember - You’re Welcome - Amazon.com Music
s: I just got the vinyl today (6 days after release) The vinyl sounds fantastic to me on my little setup. I have the Audio Technica LP120XUSB with the Edifier R1700BT Speakers. I've been listening to this album since release on streaming services and I enjoy it very much!
